channel.title: Login problem on RSCD forums?
channel.description: Im using rscd/havok forums, but when users register they cant login.. it just redirects them back to index, unlogged. I think its something in the db, but im not sure, I have replaced the www files to see if that would change anything, but to no prevail, it didnt. can someone help me? link is http://www.rsc-saints.tk ty very much(;

item.title: Login problem on RSCD forums?
item.dc:creator: @ksv ksv
item.description:
@ksv wrote:

some of my m8s, using internet explore or firefox cant login.
they can register just fine, but they cant login. ;s
I can login fine myself …
but lots of people cant …[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2008, 05:22:45 pm[/size][hr]i tried everything, changed www files, didnt work.
i think its in db somewhere, but have no clue where in db it is…

Read full topic
